template.name: Template App Netatmo Weather
template.description: Template for netatmo weather station https://github.com/pfoo/zabbix-netatmo

discovery_rule.name: Netatmo weather outdoor module discovery
discovery_rule.description: Netatmo weather outdoor module discovery rules

trigger_prototype.name: Netatmo {#STATION_NAME} {#MODULE_NAME} : less than 20% of battery remaining

item_prototype.name: Netatmo {#STATION_NAME} - {#MODULE_NAME} - Battery status
item_prototype.description:
Station : {#STATION_NAME} Module : {#MODULE_NAME} Battery Status
6000 : Max 5500 : full 5000 : high 4500 : medium 4000 : low <4000 : very low

trigger_prototype.name: Netatmo {#STATION_NAME} {#MODULE_NAME} : Battery Status is low

dependency.name: Netatmo {#STATION_NAME} {#MODULE_NAME} : Battery Status is very low

trigger_prototype.name: Netatmo {#STATION_NAME} {#MODULE_NAME} : Battery Status is very low
Netatmo {#STATION_NAME} {#MODULE_NAME} : Module is disconnected

86 : Bad 71 : Average 56 : Good
